Tutorial
rule1_1
Keep tossing Prinnies until you place 3 same colored Prinnies
・Lance des Prinnies et alignes-en trois de la
・プリニーを投げて同じ色のプリニーを３つ以上そろえて
●프리니를 던져서 같은 색의 프리니를 3개 이상 나열하여
・Toss Prinnies and match three of the same color
●拋出Prinny然後集齊三隻或以上相同顏色的Prinny
●拋出Prinny然後集齊三隻或以上相同顏色的Prinny
・Toss Prinnies and match three of the same color
rule1_2
There is a limit to how many times you can throw the Prinnies,
・Tu peux lancer des Prinnies un certain nombre de fois seulement.
・プリニーを投げる回数は制限があり、ハートを３つ以上
●프리니를 던지는 횟수는 제한이 있으며, 하트를 3개 이상
・You can only toss Prinnies a certain number of times.
●拋Prinny的次數有限，一次將三個以上的HEART消去
●拋Prinny的次數有限，一次將三個以上的HEART消去
・You can only toss Prinnies a certain number of times.
rule1_3
If you keep erasing Prinnies, there is a chance that a PringerX
・Continue à effacer les Prinnies et Pringer X
・プリニーを消していくとプリニガーXが降ってくることが
●프리니를 지워가면 프리니가 X가 내려오는 경우가
・Keep erasing Prinnies, and eventually Pringer X
●如果消去Prinny的話，Priniga X 有機會
●如果消去Prinny的話，Priniga X 有機會
・Keep erasing Prinnies, and eventually Pringer X
rule1_4
You cannot toss on top of a Heart or PringerX.
・Tu ne peux pas lancer des Prinnies sur des coeurs ou sur Pringer X.
・ハートとプリニガーXの上に投げる事は出来ません。
●하트와 프리니가X 위로는 던질 수 없습니다.
・You cannot toss Prinnies on top of hearts or Pringer X.
●不能在HEART和Priniga X的上面拋。
●不能在HEART和Priniga X的上面拋。
・You cannot toss Prinnies on top of hearts or Pringer X.
rule2_1
Etna will toss 2 Prinnies.
. Etna peut lancer deux Prinnies.
・エトナはプリニーを２つ持って投げます。
●에트나는 프리니를 2개 가지고 던집니다.
・Etna will toss two Prinnies at once.
●Etna手持及拋出兩隻Prinny。
●Etna手持及拋出兩隻Prinny。
・Etna will toss two Prinnies at once.
rule2_2
You can spin or rotate the Prinny by pressing the [TRIANGLE] button.
・Appuie sur [TRIANGLE] pour faire tourner le Prinny que tu lances.
・[TRIANGLE]を押すことによって投げるプリニーを回転出来ます。
●[TRIANGLE]을 누르면 던질 프리니를 회전 시킬 수 있습니다.
・Press [TRIANGLE] to spin the Prinny you're tossing.
●按[TRIANGLE]迴轉準備拋出的Prinny。
●按[TRIANGLE]迴轉準備拋出的Prinny。
・Press [TRIANGLE] to spin the Prinny you're tossing.
rule2_3
By doing so you can toss the Prinny vertically or horizontally.
. Avec ceci, tu peux placer deux Prinnies verticalement en même temps.
・その為、縦横二つに並べて投げる事が可能です。
●그래서 가로 세로 두 개 나열하여 던질 수 있습니다.
・With this you can place two Prinnies vertically at once.
●所以，您可以按喜好放置及拋出兩隻Prinny。
●所以，您可以按喜好放置及拋出兩隻Prinny。
・With this you can place two Prinnies vertically at once.
rule3_1
You can toss a Prinny between two Prinnies.
・Tu peux lancer un Prinny entre deux Prinnies.
・プリニーをプリニーとプリニーの間に投げる事が出来ます。
●프리니를 프리니와 프리니 사이에 던질 수 있습니다. 던지면
・You can toss Prinnies in the spaces in between.
●您可以將Prinny拋到兩隻Prinny的中間。
●您可以將Prinny拋到兩隻Prinny的中間。
・You can toss Prinnies in the spaces in between.
rule3_2
The Prinny that is pushed out will be moved to the FEVER column.
・Les Prinnies poussés iront dans la Boîte Enfièvrée.
・押し出されたプリニーは画面右のFEVER枠に入ります。
●밀려난 프리니는 화면 우측의 FEVER칸에 들어갑니다.
・Pushed out Prinnies will go into the Fever Box.
●被推出的Prinny會進入畫面右面的FEVER框。
●被推出的Prinny會進入畫面右面的FEVER框。
・Pushed out Prinnies will go into the Fever Box.
rule3_3
When you enter FEVER mode. Prinnies with the same color
・Quand tu entres en Mode FIÈVRE, les Prinnies dans la Boîte Enfièvrée
・FEVER枠はフィーバーモードに突入した時、枠の中の色と
●FEVER칸은 피버 모드로 돌입할 때 칸 안의 색과 같은
・When you enter FEVER Mode, the Prinnies in the Fever Box
●在Fever模式，FEVER框擁有將和框內的顏色
●在Fever模式，FEVER框擁有將和框內的顏色
・When you enter FEVER Mode, the Prinnies in the Fever Box
rule4_1
You will enter FEVER mode by getting
・Aligne 3 Pringer X pour entrer
・プリニガーXを３つ以上そろえて消すとフィーバーモード
●프리니가X를 3개 이상 나열해서 지우면 피버 모드
・Put 3 Pringer X's together to go into
●如果集齊並消去三隻以上的Priniga X，
●如果集齊並消去三隻以上的Priniga X，
・Put 3 Pringer X's together to go into
rule4_2
During FEVER mode you will get more points. The gauge on the bottom screen
・Tu gagneras plus de points en Mode FIÈVRE. Le nombre dans la jauge
・フィーバー中は得点が高くなります。画面下のゲージの
●피버 중은 득점이 올라갑니다. 화면 밑에 있는 게이지
・You'll gain more points while in FEVER Mode. The number
●Fever時分數會增加。畫面下方的計量表
●Fever時分數會增加。畫面下方的計量表
・You'll gain more points while in FEVER Mode. The number
rule4_3
If you toss a Prinny your gauge will decrease. FEVER mode ends when this gauge is completed depleted.
・La jauge diminue quand tu lances des Prinnies et le Mode FIÈVRE se termine quand elle est vide.
・プリニーを投げるとゲージが減少し、無くなると終了です。
●프리니를 던지면 게이지가 감소되며, 없어지면 종료됩니다.
・The gauge will decrease as you throw Prinnies, and FEVER Mode will end when it empties.
●當您拋出Prinny時計量表會下降，降至零時遊戲便會結束。
●當您拋出Prinny時計量表會下降，降至零時遊戲便會結束。
・The gauge will decrease as you throw Prinnies, and FEVER Mode will end when it empties.
rule4_4
In order to regain the gauge you will have to erase a PringerX.
・Efface les Pringer X pour remplir la jauge. Cela va aussi
・ゲージは再度プリニガーXを消すと回復します。
●게이지는 다시 프리니가X를 지우면 회복됩니다.
・Erase Pringer X's to fill the gauge again.
●再次消去Priniga X時計量表便會回復。
●再次消去Priniga X時計量表便會回復。
・Erase Pringer X's to fill the gauge again.
rule5_1
If you erase a Heart during FEVER mode
・En effaçant des coeurs pendant le Mode FIÈVRE, une forme de coeur apparaîtra.
・フィーバー中にハートを消すと、ハートの形を描いて
●피버 중에 하트를 지우면 하트 모양을 그리며
・Erasing hearts during FEVER Mode displays a heart shape.
●在Fever時消去HEART，畫一個心形
●在Fever時消去HEART，畫一個心形
・Erasing hearts during FEVER Mode displays a heart shape.
rule5_2
During FEVER mode a Heart will be mixed into your tossing Prinnies.
・Attention aux coeurs en lançant les Prinnies en Mode FIÈVRE.
・フィーバー中は投げるプリニーの中に、ハートが混じる事
●피버 중에는 던지는 프리니 속에 하트가 섞여 있는 경우
・Watch for hearts while throwing Prinnies in FEVER Mode.
●在Fever模式時拋的Prinny裡可能混入HEART
●在Fever模式時拋的Prinny裡可能混入HEART
・Watch for hearts while throwing Prinnies in FEVER Mode.
rule5_3
All the PringerX will disappear when the FEVER mode
・Tous les Pringer X vont disparaître quand
・フィーバーモードが終了すると、全てのプリニガーXが
●피버 모드가 끝나면 모든 프리니가X가
・All Pringer X's will vanish
●Fever模式終止時，所有Priniga X
●Fever模式終止時，所有Priniga X
・All Pringer X's will vanish
rule6_1
Hearts and PringerX cannot be erased by tossing a Prinny on top of it or
・Les coeurs et les Pringer X ne peuvent pas être remplacés
・ハートとプリニガーXはプリニーを投げて上書きするのも、
●하트와 프리니가X는 프리니를 던져서 덮어쓰거나
・Hearts and Pringer X's can't be overwritten with tossed Prinnies
●您不能拋出Prinny去蓋過Heart和Priniga X
●您不能拋出Prinny去蓋過Heart和Priniga X
・Hearts and Pringer X's can't be overwritten with tossed Prinnies
rule6_2
When you push an object outside Prinnies with the same color next to it will
・Quand tu pousses un Prinny, les Prinnies à côté de lui ayant la même couleur
・外に押し出す時、隣の隣も同じ色ならつられる様にその
●밖으로 밀어낼 때, 옆의 옆도 같은 색이라면
・When pushing out a Prinny, if the Prinnies next to it are the same color,
●推出時如果和旁邊相鄰的是相同顏色，
●推出時如果和旁邊相鄰的是相同顏色，
・When pushing out a Prinny, if the Prinnies next to it are the same color,
rule8_1
To gain a high score you will need to keep the FEVER mode going as long as you can.
・La clé pour un score élevé est de prolonger le Mode FIÈVRE autant que possible.
・高得点を出すためにはフィーバーモードを長続きさせるの
●고득점을 내기 위해서는 피버 모드를 오래 지속하는 것
・The key to a high score is to prolong FEVER Mode for as long as possible.
●要取得高分數，必須長久保持Fever模式
●要取得高分數，必須長久保持Fever模式
・The key to a high score is to prolong FEVER Mode for as long as possible.
rule8_2
PringerX will eventually appear if you keep erasing Prinnies.
・Les Pringer X vont apparaître quand tu effaces d'autres Prinnies.
・プリニガーＸはプリニーを消していればいつか必ず出てき
●프리니가X는 프리니를 지우다 보면 언젠가 반드시 나옵
・Pringer X's will appear as you erase other Prinnies.
●如果消去Prinny，Priniga X 遲早一定會出現
●如果消去Prinny，Priniga X 遲早一定會出現
・Pringer X's will appear as you erase other Prinnies.
rule7_1
If a heart is stacked diagonally it becomes difficult to erase.
・Les coeurs placés diagonalement deviennent très durs à effacer.
・ハートが斜めに配置されると消すことが難しくなります。
●하트가 대각선으로 배치되면 지우기가 힘들어집니다.
・Hearts placed diagonally become even harder to erase.
●如果將HEART斜放便會更難消去。
●如果將HEART斜放便會更難消去。
・Hearts placed diagonally become even harder to erase.
rule7_2
If you're having a tough time executing the FEVER mode
・Si tu as des difficultés en Mode FIÈVRE, continue à pousser
・フィーバーモードに突入するのが難しいなら連続押し出し
●피버 모드에 돌입하는 것이 어려우면 연속으로 밀어내기
・If you have trouble going into FEVER Mode, keep on pushing Prinnies out
●如果很難闖入Fever mode的話，來用繼續向外推
●如果很難闖入Fever mode的話，來用繼續向外推
・If you have trouble going into FEVER Mode, keep on pushing Prinnies out
